job.title: Senior Data Scientist
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Information Technology and Services
job.description: pstrongSenior Data ScientiststrongppstrongTravel Leisure amp Tourismstrongppstrong12500  140000 plus bonus amp benefits strongppstrongRemote US BASED  ESTstrongppnbspppstrongTHE COMPANY strongppAn eCommerce company operating in the leisure travel and tourism industry is searching for a Senior Data Scientist to join their team This organization focuses primarily on the travel rewards and benefits subsector My client has recently entered a high growth period and is looking to scale their analytics divisionppnbspppstrongTHE ROLEstrongppIn the role of Senior Data Scientist you will be responsible for analyzing products and marketing campaigns as well as handling data decision models This will include managing AB testing platforms as well as building ranking models and pricing models ppnbspppstrongYOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCESstrongppThe Senior Data Scientist must havepulliCommercial experience with logistic regression gradient boosting and XG BoostliliHandson exercise with using both SQL and Python on a regular basisliliPreviously worked in an eCommerce or customer datafocused environmentliliAbility to multitask handle several roles with different areas of focusliulpnbspppstrongTHE BENEFITSstrongppAs a Director of Analytics you can earn as much as 140000 per year depending on your experience as well as several different bonuses benefits including unlimited PTOppstrongnbspstrongppstrongHOW TO APPLYstrongppPlease register your interest by sending your CV to Andrew Bauersfeld via the Apply link on this pageppnbspppstrongKEYWORDSstrongppemSenior Data Scientist Data Scientist Logistic Regression Gradient Boost XG Boost SQL Python eCommerce Customer Data Analysis Analytics Travel Tourism Leisure Rewards Benefitsemp
